contents.item: God called us to live a holy life by his grace.
What a privilege to pray?
To love God is to love your neighbour.
I believe in what you see is what you get, but I also believe in what you see is getting better!
Faith in God is the force of life.
To return to the Might God is to truly rely on Him.
Until God draws you to himself, can you come close to Him.
The Holy Scripture reveals spiritual realities.
God hasn't given up on man.He just doesn't understand him.
Oh, Lord, why was she doomed to adore a man steeped in blindness and utter stupidity?
Praying is a prevailing force.
Your little choices become habits that affect the bigger decisions you make in life.
We must seek the inner self, the power within.
My only Hope is in Jesus Christ.
There are two kinds of leaders, cowboys and Shepherds. Cowboys drive and Shepherds lead.
If God has given us life, He is capable of any other thing.
Every great leader can take you back to a defining moment when they decided to lead
The Maker is full of great mercy.
Holy Faith is fear for God.
The greatest joy is the grace of salvation through faith in Jesus Christ.
Christians must set their mind on the Saviour, Jesus Christ.
May God overflow your life with bountiful blessings of grace.
When God opens a door no one will shut, When he shuts no one will open.
To live without love, is to have no light.
Life is a curriculum unique to every student.
I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me..Phil 3:14
contents.owner: Aileen  Friedman, Changes From a Sunset

contents.item: O God open our eyes to see the wonders of your holy word.
Most High God, how excellent is thy Holy name.
If you have ever sin, you will appreciate the grace of salvation through Faith in Christ Jesus.
I've gone to prepare a place for youBut I will come back again.
contents.owner: Anonymous, Holy Bible: King James Version

contents.item: Without strength can we work?
How can we believe in Christ Jesus, without reading the Holy Bible?
We are born to make manifest the glory of God.
Is there any certainty like the Truth?
If we longer rely on God, it means we have rejected the rule of a righteous Ruler.
What a man may value highly, is detestable in God’s sight.
A man needs only his daily bread.
Grace will follow us even when we are going the wrong way
Whatever we are is what God want us to be!
Forget all about ‘What if’. Believe in possibilities.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Set your soul in search of th he truth.
No circumstance is uncommon to a man.
Every man needs God's mercy.
If you delight yourself in lord, He shall give you desires of your heart.
To delight in God is to desire Jesus Christ.
Faith in God is an eager expectation.
Jesus Christ is three in one: the way, the truth, and the life.
The peace within is the power of the Holy Spirit.
You shouldn’t live for yourself alone but you must also learn to live the Christian life
We are new creation in Jesus Christ.
Grace is freely given by God.
God you are so good, you gives what is needful.
Only the Truth of God shall set you free from every falsehood.
Experience is the truest education.
Christ Jesus dwell in the hearts of a community of faith.
If we fix our eyes on Jesus Christ, He will perfect our faith in God.
Adversity is an adventure.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Stand like a beaten anvil.It is the part of a good athlete to be bruised and to prevail.
contents.owner: Ignatius of Antioch, The Epistles of Ignatius and Polycarp

contents.item: Every Christian must subject the rule of King Jesus Christ.
Nothing can enslaved us, if we free in our minds.
The heavenly Father is faithful.
Only when we pray for one another, we will have peace.
Forgiveness is first act of faith.
There is a hope of salvation for every sinner.
Ah, what an awe great God!
Why don't you read the Good News of God.
Can a man's life be complete without his Maker?
The Son of God is the Saviour.
Oh God, teach us thy truth.
The Truth is first rejected. Then finally accepted.
Life is always great, when shared in a spirit of love.
No work for grace. It can only be received through faith in Jesus Christ.
Why consult the dead on behalf of the living?
God Is, Lucifer is a devil, and there is a Hell.
contents.owner: E.A. Bucchianeri, Faust: My Soul Be Damned for the World Volume 1

contents.item: The greatest life is the love for God. And the love for thy neighbour.
Part of leadership is preparing those who follow to someday go on ahead without you.
There is no greater life, than to love God. And to love thy neighbor as thyself.
What an awe God we serve?
Who can stand the weight of God's wrath?
Every house is built by a man. But Maker is the Builder of life.
Whoever blessings, shall be abundantly blessed.
Every sin can be forgiven by the heavenly Father.
Faith is a fortified wall.
All things are possible when we believe in God.
True friendship is th treasure of forgiveness.
THE CHOICE LIES IN THY HAND O GOD!
O heavenly Father increase our Faith.
My righteousness is just as good as Jesus' righteousness, because it IS Jesus' righteousness!
May the goodness of God's face forever shine on our path.
Whatever God gives you enjoy!
